name: Color Switcher (LaMax)
description:
- About -

"Color Switcher" is a puzzle game, more precisely a Sokoban! In which you embody a small robot having to push boxes on their objectives with the corresponding colors!

- Made by -

Laura Beugin

Maxens Haramburu (me)

Charles Roger-Boutbien

Mathieu Pradier

This game was made during a team school project at Isart DIGITAL, for a period of 2 months.
